definition: to indulge in flights of fancy (idiom)/to let one's imagination run wild
surname Hu
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
beard/mustache/whiskers
see 衚衕|胡同[hu2 tong4]
to think/to consider
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: She was never flighty like you.
sentences.chinese: 她从来不像你这样胡思乱想。

sentences.english: My fantasy spills soup and gravy .
sentences.chinese: 由于我在胡思乱想，倒翻了菜汤和肉汁。
人一闲下来就会胡思乱想。

sentences.english: Studies show that the average person experiences paranoia on a daily basis.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明普通人每天都会有一些胡思乱想的体验。

sentences.english: She dreamt about vacation plans when she should have been working.
sentences.chinese: 她在本应工作时胡思乱想着度假计划。

sentences.english: As he sat on his bunk that final night, butterflies fluttered in his stomach.
sentences.chinese: 在最后一夜他坐在自己的铺位上，开始胡思乱想。

sentences.english: What with his students and what with his sports, the school-boy had no time left for idle thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 一半是功课，一半是运动，学生没有时间胡思乱想。

sentences.english: I will lie in bed, awake, forever thinking and rethinking whatever happens to be on my mind at the time.
sentences.chinese: 而我，却总躺在床上，胡思乱想，难以入梦。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Period, in the State of Qi there was a man who always let his imagination run away with him.
sentences.chinese: 春秋时代，杞国有一个喜欢胡思乱想的人。

sentences.english: He says he works hard, but he's day-dreaming half the time.
sentences.chinese: 他说他工作努力，但他却常常在胡思乱想。

sentences.english: That then takes you away from the task at hand. Or you may even end up nodding off.
sentences.chinese: 如果不把你从胡思乱想中拉回来，你甚至可能打瞌睡。

sentences.english: Oatmeal may help if you find yourself feeling irritable and cranky.
sentences.chinese: 燕麦可以帮助你缓解急躁和胡思乱想的情绪。

sentences.english: I noticed that my bread was leaving a lot of crumbs on thefloor, while I daydreamed.
sentences.chinese: 我才发现我在胡思乱想的时候把面包屑都弄到地上了。

sentences.english: Dorothea felt rather ashamed as she detected herself in these speculations .
sentences.chinese: 多萝西娅发现自己这么胡思乱想，不免有些脸红。

sentences.english: Oh, please do not suggest anything incestuous.
sentences.chinese: 哦，请你们别胡思乱想了。

sentences.english: We don’t know how hard it is to stop thinking until we try.
sentences.chinese: 如果不去尝试，我们不会知道要停止胡思乱想有多难。
